title: TenderConfig
description: Set of available settings for tender

doReconcileAmount.description: Indicates whether reconciliation of amount is required

doReconcileQuantity.description: If true, it is required to populate ActualCount when commiting an actual count

isCashChanger.description: If true, reconciliation type is CASH_CHANGER

maxAllowedAmount.description: The max allowed amount  this tender

minAllowedAmount.description: The min allowed amount  this tender

maxAllowedDeviationQuantity.description: The max allowed deviation quantity of this tender

maxAllowedDeviationAmount.description: The max allowed deviation amount for this tender

maxAllowedStoreDeviationQuantity.description: The max allowed store deviation quantity of this tender

maxAllowedStoreDeviationAmount.description: The max allowed store deviation amount for this tender

defaultInitialBalance.description: The value that will be used by default for the initial balance
